name: Nuvei Corporation
description: Nuvei Corporation is a leading global payment technology provider, headquartered in Montreal, Canada. Founded in 2014, Nuvei's mission is to simplify payment processing for businesses and enhance the customer experience through innovative and tailored solutions. The company offers a wide range of services, including payment processing, gateway services, and risk management solutions, allowing merchants to accept various payment methods across multiple channels. Nuvei supports local payment options in over 200 markets, facilitating transactions in more than 150 currencies. The company is recognized for its commitment to security and compliance, providing advanced fraud prevention tools and adhering to global regulatory standards. Nuvei serves a diverse clientele, including e-commerce businesses, retail merchants, and gaming companies, and leverages cutting-edge technology to deliver seamless payment experiences. With a focus on scalability and flexibility, Nuvei empowers businesses to grow and adapt in an increasingly digital economy. The company has made strategic acquisitions to enhance its service offerings and expand its global reach, positioning itself as a trusted partner in the payments ecosystem.
